Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay for the price and location”
Reviews.Author: Crunchero
Reviews.Content: enjoyed time hotel staff friendly clean upgraded arrived apartment 6 people hotel location bit party bit noisy night travel ear plugs overall recommend hotel budget option close amenities

Reviews.Title: “Not a bad place to stay”
Reviews.Author: C K Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights cost location fantastic 24 hour reception ideal service exceptional downfall noise level outside disturbances throughout night meant night sleep apart hotel

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and cheerful but excellent value for money.”
Reviews.Author: MrsMuriachi
Reviews.Content: stayed city hotel 4 nights christmas 2011 beside rembrandt square close lots restaurants shops variety coffee shops short walk dam square loved hotel booked return april basic clean staff friendly helpful evidence negative comments earlier reviews dont concern youre looking cheap cheerful smoking allowed close entertainment highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for some....just not me”
Reviews.Author: weepinwillow
Reviews.Content: firstthe goodthe staff location 87 steps roomwhich day amsterdam partier love atmosphere rembrandt square buti am wasnt romantic husband stayed city hotel honeymoon fun backit am fussy future trips require elevator amsterdam hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very poor hotel”
Reviews.Author: Tinkerboy
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights hated noisy cramped check hotel reception time walk forgot beforehand iron bring quick flat iron clothes dining people breakfast embarrassed couldnt bothered ironing spend break wrinkled clothes safe broken uneasy leaving valuables hotel avoid

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel out of months of traveling.”
Reviews.Author: feleenie
Reviews.Content: begin arrived greeted difficult desk lying trying steal cash plain misinformed unhelpful prepaid online credit card denied demanded cash stating cash atm using computer lobby pulled website visa printed booking receipt valid peoples credit card slips name sprawled table obviously lying course personal info displayed top fiancee bunk beds picture informed beds poor quality metal broken beds bent mattresses floor avoid pain linens smelled housekeeping dumped clean towels else check key time leave nervous suspicious person left desk dump overpriced wifi poor rarely location

Reviews.Title: “It's a long way to the top”
Reviews.Author: Kirt2112
Reviews.Content: top building narrow steps top dated comfortable excellent location rembrandt square cool crowded amsterdam english pub below hotel food service hotel staff helpful cordial

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here”
Reviews.Author: Travelingkind
Reviews.Content: location hotel near train station thats tiny luggage inbetween beds hotel noisy especially night crowd comes night waking hours basement choice price paid thats people stairs noisy paid euros 2 2 nights 2 star hotel 1 star chose hotel convience near central station otherwise stayed miles town hotel staff tho fantastic helpful friendly
